title: You all wanted Diversity
body:
We got it.

Yorick top

Nautilus Support.

Bring it forums. Beg for the nerfs. You know you want to.

replies.body: Yorick has been and always will be a counter pick until he's reworked.  Naut Support has been Dark Horse for a while, but requires a smart ADC to work with.
Yorick is actually one of the best duelers in the game.

Yes, but we know how these forums work.

"They were picked, they must be OP"

People can't claim to support diversity while supporting the meta.

Edit: This proves my point with the down vote abuse.

1) Truth hurts. Deal with it.
2) You can't blame riot for all your problems. Grow up.
I don't care, I know how to deal with Yorick.

i actually just shat upon a Yorick top a few games ago,
its surprisingly pretty damn weak
